name: Adobe MPEG Index File
summary: Learn about .MPGINDEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: MPGINDEX files are cached when new videos are imported. This provides the Adobe software a substantial performance improvement when accessing video content. However, there may be a delay the first time the video data is cached.
NOTE: MPGINDEX files are actually created by Adobe Media Encoder, a software component that is included with Adobe applications such as Premiere Pro, After Effects, and Encore.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
